meanings: (법에 의해 신체의 자유를) [명사] imprisonment, confinement, detention, [동사] imprison, jail (sb for sth), put[throw, send] sb in prison
(생각·행동의 자유를) [명사] restriction, restraint, [동사] restrict, restrain, tie (sb) down (=속박)
